sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Rise of ghosts. Royal eccentricities grow sharper. Calanfer’s role deepens, Noelictus’ secrets leak.

sections.title: Ghosts
sections.content: Figures such as Ser Dalius Bedornial emerge in tombs. Crypt wards fray; ghosts begin to surface.

sections.title: Hunters & Guild
sections.content: Veterans double down on secrecy. Haeight pushes reforms. Ikhoven entrenches bureaucracy. Piortesenzth remains feared.

sections.title: Events
sections.content: Spectral incursions shake Guild trust. Royal eccentricity worsens as wards weaken. Foreign politics eye Noelictus.

sections.title: Nyx Threads
sections.content: Nyx’s abilities react strongly to ghosts. Encounters escalate her ramp/flicker powers. Darryn-style threats intrude suddenly to test her.
